sub_title: Google: Team Lead B2C Product Marketing Team, Northern Europe
summary:
Product Marketing Manager with 10 years of marketing experience, with strong track record in Brand / Consumer Marketing and Marketing & Communications. I'm a storyteller, brand builder and independent thinker who can ensure a brand’s communications can connect with its audience, across mediums and geographies. I have an innovative mindset and passion for technology, past-faced environments, disruptive markets and organizations that break boundaries and barriers.

Strong Marketing Profile: 
* Vast expertise in developing, planning, executing and monitoring strategic brand visions and marketing strategy against business goals that drive impact and deliver outstanding return on investment (ROI). 
* Proven trackrecord with marketing communications, positioning, messaging and developing tactical marketing plans leveraging 360° communications: digital, offline & direct marketing, events, partnerships, public activations, marketing stunts etc. 
* Expertise in reputation and image development & management - building positive relations & perception with users and customers. 

International experience: 
* I have several years of experience living, studying and working abroad (e.g San Francisco, Philadelphia and Sydney). 
* I most recently lived some years in San Francisco and worked for Google in Silicon Valley, building Google’s brand in the US and globally. 
* I'm currently based in Amsterdam, and work for Google for the six markets in Benelux & Nordics (Netherlands, Belgium, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway)

Strong educational background:
* I completed two Master’s degrees in 1) Marketing Management and 2) Development Studies. Bachelor’s degree in International Business. 
* I graduated Cum Laude / With Honor for all three degrees. 

Specialties: 
* Marketing Strategy & Plans, Campaign Development, Branding, Advertising, Digital, Offline & Direct Marketing, Event Marketing, Integrated & Multimedia comms, B2B (incl. small business), Partnerships, Market Launches, Market and Product Positioning, Market Research, Brand & Reputation Management, CSR, Social Impact Marketing

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.description: Team Lead for the Consumer Product Marketing team, responsible for launching and growing a broad portfolio of Hardware products (Pixel, Nest, Chromebooks) and Software products (Apps)
profile_positions.title: Team Lead B2C Product Marketing Team - Benelux & Nordics (Northern Europe)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for launching and growing consumer products in the Northern-Europe region (Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway). Leading the Northern-Europe Chromebook marketing team. 

Developing marketing / go-to-market strategy and marketing communications to shape the voice of the product and gain a fast-growing and loyal consumer base. Working with a cross-functional team across product development, engineering, corporate communications, sales, legal and more.
profile_positions.title: Lead Product Marketing Manager - Consumer/B2C Marketing, Benelux & Nordics (Northern Europe)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for launching and growing consumer products in the Northern-Europe region (Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway), most recently Chromebook laptop devices and our Smart Assistant / the Google Assistant. 

Developing marketing / go-to-market strategy and marketing communications to shape the voice of the product and gain a fast-growing and loyal consumer base. Working with a cross-functional team across product development, engineering, corporate communications, sales, legal and more.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Marketing Manager - Consumer/B2C Marketing, Benelux & Nordics (Northern Europe)

profile_positions.description: PMM for six markets in Northern Europe (Netherlands, Belgium, Denmark, Sweden, Finland, Norway), leading programs and campaigns to drive forward Google's key brand values, products and initiatives. Through key understanding of our brand and local insights, I'm developing programs and campaigns to positively impact the market and strengthen our brand. Building collaborations to reach audiences with our messages and working cross-functionally with PR, Policy, Sales, Legal, Product, and Engineering teams on core objectives and initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager - Brand & Reputation, Northern Europe (Benelux & Nordics)

profile_positions.description: PMM responsible for building Google's (social impact) Brand in the US and globally. Responsible for managing strategic marketing campaigns and programs that help raise awareness and increase engagement for Google.org and social impact initiatives. Engaged in a wide range of marketing activities; from strategy and positioning work, consumer research and go-to-market-strategy, to creative development of campaigns & initiatives and event management. Oversaw rollout of programs globally, incl. in EMEA, APAC and Latin America.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager - Google Brand / Google.Org - San Francisco (global headquarters)

profile_positions.description: Working on B2B Marketing / Small & Medium Businesses (SMB). Developed and implemented scalable marketing strategy and growth marketing programs for small and medium business customers across multiple markets, with a particular focus on B2B products such as AdWords. Partnered with local agencies and marketing teams to develop and implement marketing programs. Tracked and analyzed effectiveness of campaigns, incorporate key learnings into the direction of new initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Associate Product Marketing Manager - B2B Marketing - Amsterdam

Developed a strategic marketing plan for YouTube/Display B2B, conducted a Small Business research study & translated results into concrete recommendations and implementations, optimized an offline marketing campaign for AdWords, launched Street View Trike campaign and organized a YouTube agency outreach event.

profile_positions.description:
- Largest business study association in Europe, with over 5500 members. 
- As Project Manager I managed and supervised 12 committees (60 people) so that projects were successfully completed within defined scope, quality, time and cost constraints. Took roles as planner, controller, coach, expert, crisis and risk manager.
- As Board Member I was responsible for managing the organization; i.e. developing and executing policy and strategy, maintaining and developing contacts with business life, university life and politics, and supervising projects and active members.
profile_positions.title: Board member & Project Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Active volunteer organizing and managing different activities and events to grow awareness of and engagement with Unicef at a local level, for example giving guest lectures at primary schools being part of the Student Team Rotterdam.
